#summary A simple example of preprocessing of multiplexed Illumina.

= Introduction =

= Prerequisites = 
You will need the following software in your executable path.
 * [http://genome.gsc.riken.jp/osc/english/dataresource/ Tagdust] - eliminate artifactual sequence from NGS data
 * [http://code.google.com/p/ngopt/source/browse/trunk/tools/splitbc/splitBC?r=70 splitBC] - a script to split barcoded reads.
